sentences.sContent: He looked back on his university days with a certain amount of nostalgia.
sentences.sCn: 他带着一点留恋，回忆起大学时光。

sentences.sContent: a wave of nostalgia for how great life was in the 1960s
sentences.sCn: 一阵对20世纪60年代美好生活的强烈怀旧之情

trans.tranOther: a feeling that a time in the past was good, or the activity of remembering a good time in the past and wishing that things had not changed
